verses.verse: The book<WG976> of the generation<WG1078> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>, the son<WG5207> of David<WG1138>, the son<WG5207> of Abraham<WG11>.
Abraham <WG11> begat<WG1080> Isaac<WG2464>; and<WG1161> Isaac<WG2464> begat<WG1080> Jacob<WG2384>; and<WG1161> Jacob<WG2384> begat<WG1080> Judah<WG2455> and<WG2532> his<WG846> brethren<WG80>;

and <WG1161> Judah<WG2455> begat<WG1080> Perez<WG5329> and<WG2532> Zerah<WG2196> of<WG1537> Tamar<WG2283>; and<WG1161> Perez<WG5329> begat<WG1080> Hezron<WG2074>; and<WG1161> Hezron<WG2074> begat<WG1080> Ram<WG689>;
and <WG1161> Ram<WG689> begat<WG1080> Amminadab<WG284>; and<WG1161> Amminadab<WG284> begat<WG1080> Nahshon<WG3476>; and<WG1161> Nahshon<WG3476> begat<WG1080> Salmon<WG4533>;

and <WG1161> Salmon<WG4533> begat<WG1080> Boaz<WG1003> of<WG1537> Rahab<WG4477>; and<WG1161> Boaz<WG1003> begat<WG1080> Obed<WG5601> of<WG1537> Ruth<WG4503>; and<WG1161> Obed<WG5601> begat<WG1080> Jesse<WG2421>;
and <WG1161> Jesse<WG2421> begat<WG1080> David<WG1138> the king<WG935>. And<WG1161> David<WG1138> begat<WG1080> Solomon<WG4672> of<WG1537> her<WG3588> that had been the wife of<WG1537> Uriah<WG3774>;
and <WG1161> Solomon<WG4672> begat<WG1080> Rehoboam<WG4497>; and<WG1161> Rehoboam<WG4497> begat<WG1080> Abijah<WG7>; and<WG1161> Abijah<WG7> begat<WG1080> Asa<WG760>;
and <WG1161> Asa<WG760> begat<WG1080> Jehoshaphat<WG2498>; and<WG1161> Jehoshaphat<WG2498> begat<WG1080> Joram<WG2496>; and<WG1161> Joram<WG2496> begat<WG1080> Uzziah<WG3604>;
and <WG1161> Uzziah<WG3604> begat<WG1080> Jotham<WG2488>; and<WG1161> Jotham<WG2488> begat<WG1080> Ahaz<WG881>; and<WG1161> Ahaz<WG881> begat<WG1080> Hezekiah<WG1478>;
and <WG1161> Hezekiah<WG1478> begat<WG1080> Manasseh<WG3128>; and<WG1161> Manasseh<WG3128> begat<WG1080> Amon<WG300>; and<WG1161> Amon<WG300> begat<WG1080> Josiah<WG2502>;
and <WG1161> Josiah<WG2502> begat<WG1080> Jechoniah<WG2423> and<WG2532> his brethren<WG80>, at the time<WG1909> of the<WG846> carrying away to<WG3350> Babylon<WG897>.
And <WG1161> after<WG3326> the carrying away to<WG3350> Babylon<WG897>, Jechoniah<WG2423> begat<WG1080> Shealtiel<WG4528>; and<WG1161> Shealtiel<WG4528> begat<WG1080> Zerubbabel<WG2216>;
and <WG1161> Zerubbabel<WG2216> begat<WG1080> Abiud<WG10>; and<WG1161> Abiud<WG10> begat<WG1080> Eliakim<WG1662>; and<WG1161> Eliakim<WG1662> begat<WG1080> Azor<WG107>;
and <WG1161> Azor<WG107> begat<WG1080> Sadoc<WG4524>; and<WG1161> Sadoc<WG4524> begat<WG1080> Achim<WG885>; and<WG1161> Achim<WG885> begat<WG1080> Eliud<WG1664>;
Woe Eliud<WG1664> begat<WG1080> Eleazar<WG1648>; and<WG1161> Eleazar<WG1648> begat<WG1080> Matthan<WG3157>; and<WG1161> Matthan<WG3157> begat<WG1080> Jacob<WG2384>;
Woe Jacob<WG2384> begat<WG1080> Joseph<WG2501> the husband<WG435> of Mary<WG3137>, of<WG1537> whom<WG3739> was born<WG1080> Jesus<WG2424>, who is called<WG3004> Christ<WG5547>.

Ye all<WG3956> the generations<WG1074> from<WG575> Abraham<WG11> unto<WG2193> David<WG1138> are fourteen<WG1180> generations<WG1074>; and<WG2532> from<WG575> David<WG1138> unto<WG2193> the carrying away to<WG3350> Babylon<WG897> fourteen<WG1180> generations<WG1074>; and<WG2532> from<WG575> the carrying away to<WG3350> Babylon<WG897> unto<WG2193> the Christ<WG5547> fourteen<WG1180> generations<WG1074>.

And <WG1083>, the birth of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> was<WG2258> on this wise<WG3779>: When<WG1063> his<WG846> mother<WG3384> Mary<WG3137> had been betrothed<WG3423> to Joseph<WG2501>, before<WG4250> they<WG846> came together<WG4905> she was found<WG2147> with<WG2192> child<WG1064> of<WG1537> the<WG4151> Holy<WG40> Spirit<WG4151>.

And <WG1161> Joseph<WG2501> her<WG846> husband<WG435>, being<WG5607> a righteous<WG1342> man<WG2532>, and not<WG3361> willing<WG2309> to make<WG3856> her<WG846> a public example<WG3856>, was minded<WG1014> to put<WG630> her<WG846> away<WG630> privily<WG2977>.

He when<WG1760> he<WG846> thought on<WG1760> these things<WG5023>, behold<WG2400>, an angel<WG32> of the Lord<WG2962> appeared<WG5316> unto him<WG846> in<WG2596> a dream<WG3677>, saying<WG3004>, Joseph<WG2501>, thou son<WG5207> of David<WG1138>, fear<WG5399> not<WG3361> to take unto thee<WG3880> Mary<WG3137> thy<WG4675> wife<WG1135>: for that<WG1063> which<WG3588> is conceived<WG1080> in<WG1722> her<WG846> is<WG2076> of<WG1537> the<WG4151> Holy<WG40> Spirit<WG4151>.

And <WG1161> she shall bring forth<WG5088> a son<WG5207>; and<WG2532> thou shalt call<WG2564> his<WG846> name<WG3686> JESUS<WG2424>; for<WG1063> it is he<WG846> that shall save<WG4982> his<WG846> people<WG2992> from<WG575> their<WG846> sins<WG266>.

Now <WG1161> all<WG3650> this<WG5124> is come<WG1096> to pass<WG2443>, that it might be fulfilled<WG4137> which<WG3588> was spoken<WG4483> by<WG1223> the Lord<WG2962> through<WG5259> the prophet<WG4396>, saying<WG3004>,

Behold <WG2400>, the virgin<WG3933> shall be<WG2192> with<WG1722> child<WG1064>, and<WG2532> shall bring forth<WG5088> a son<WG5207>, And<WG2532> they shall call<WG2564> his<WG846> name<WG3686> Immanuel<WG1694>; which<WG3739> is<WG2076>, being interpreted<WG3177>, God<WG2316> with<WG3326> us<WG2257>.

And <WG1161> Joseph<WG2501> arose<WG1326> from<WG575> his sleep<WG5258>, and did<WG4160> as<WG5613> the angel<WG32> of the Lord<WG2962> commanded<WG4367> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> took unto him<WG3880> his<WG846> wife<WG1135>;
and <WG2532> knew<WG1097> her<WG846> not<WG3756> till<WG2193> she had brought<WG5088> forth<WG846> a<WG4416> son<WG5207>: and<WG2532> he called<WG2564> his<WG846> name<WG3686> JESUS<WG2424>.
